parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Kapp the submission is for.

parameter.label: Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the form the submission is for.

parameter.label: Values
parameter.tooltip: JSON map of submission field values.

parameters.parameter:
<%= content = {} content["Form"] = @form['Name'] content["Date"] = @submission['Submitted At'] content["url"] = "/#/kapps/services/requests/request/#{@submission['Id']}/review"
values = {} values["Member ID"] = @values['Members'] values["Type"] = "Request" values["Direction"] = "Inbound" values["Content"] = content.to_json
values.to_json %>

parameter.label: Current Page Name
parameter.tooltip: Set the current page name.

parameter.label: Current Page Navigation
parameter.tooltip: Set the current page navigation.

parameter.label: Origin ID
parameter.tooltip: Set the origin ID.

parameter.label: Parent ID
parameter.tooltip: Set the parent ID.

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission exists in (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission for which the activity is being created for.

parameter.label: Label
parameter.tooltip: The label for the submission activity.

parameter.label: Description
parameter.tooltip: The description of the submission activity.

parameters.parameter: {"Message":"Cancellation Request for <%= @values['Student First Name']%> <%= @values['Student Last Name']%> is complete."}

parameter.label: Type
parameter.tooltip: Specifies the a submission activity 'Type', which should indicate what type of data is included.

parameter.label: Data
parameter.tooltip: Additional data that can be used by resources consuming the submission activity record (for example a Request bundle may render submission details based upon JSON content in the activity data).

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission being updated.

parameter.label: State
parameter.tooltip: The value used to set the submission state.

parameter.label: Values
parameter.tooltip: A JSON map of field names to values that should be set.

parameter.label: Current Page Name
parameter.tooltip: Set the current page name.

parameter.label: Current Page Navigation
parameter.tooltip: Set the current page navigation.

parameter.label: Origin ID
parameter.tooltip: Set the origin ID.

parameter.label: Parent ID
parameter.tooltip: Set the parent ID.

parameters.parameter:
<%= nowDt=DateTime.now startDt=Date.parse(@values['The last debit will be taken on'])
(startDt.mjd - nowDt.mjd)+1 %>

parameter.label: Wait time:
parameter.tooltip: Time you want to wait for deferred task

parameter.label: Time unit:
parameter.tooltip: Unit of measurement for time (Seconds, Minutes, Hours, Days, Weeks)

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Retrieve By
parameter.tooltip: How to retrieve the submission. Id or Query.

parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the kapp to query

parameter.label: Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the form to query

parameter.label: Query
parameter.tooltip: A query that will retrieve a single submission

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The id of the submission being retrieved.

task.label: Active Or Frozen Or Pending Frozen
task.value: JSON.parse(@results['Get Member']['Values JSON'])["Status"]=="Active" || JSON.parse(@results['Get Member']['Values JSON'])["Status"]=="Pending Freeze" || JSON.parse(@results['Get Member']['Values JSON'])["Status"]=="Frozen"

parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Space the submission is being retrieved from (defaults to info value if not provided).

parameter.label: Datastore Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Datastore Form to search for submissions in.

parameter.label: Index
parameter.tooltip: The index to use for the search.

parameter.label: Query
parameter.tooltip: The query that will be used to search the submissions. Ex: values[company]=Kinetic

parameters.parameter: values[Status]="Active" AND values[Record Type]="Member" AND values[Member Condition]="Cancelled" AND values[Member Condition Duration]="0"

parameter.label: Limit
parameter.tooltip: An integer representing the max results that the search can return.

parameter.label: Return Type
parameter.tooltip: The format that the results should be returned in.

parameter.label: Journey Triggers JSON
parameter.tooltip: Journney Trigger records as JSON

parameter.label: Record ID
parameter.tooltip: Record ID of Lead or member

parameter.label: Record Name
parameter.tooltip: Record Name of Lead or member
